mapper.sql: kugou_mv.mv_id as mv_id, kugou_mv.mv_name as mv_name, kugou_mv.mv_hash as mv_hash, kugou_mv.mv_hc_url as mv_hc_url, kugou_mv.mv_hd_url as mv_hd_url, kugou_mv.mv_bd_url as mv_bd_url, kugou_mv.mv_head_image as mv_head_image, kugou_mv.mv_update_time as mv_update_time, kugou_mv.mv_class_name as mv_class_name, kugou_mv.mv_listener_count as mv_listener_count
mapper.select: select from kugou_mv where kugou_mv.mv_name like concat(#{mvName},'%')
mapper.update: update kugou_mv set mv_update_time=#{updateTime} where mv_id=#{id}
mapper.select: select from kugou_mv where kugou_mv.mv_class_name like concat(#{className} ,'%') order by kugou_mv.mv_listener_count limit 0,#{n}
